thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Darla Everitt
thread.title_full: Smith & Noble reviewed by Darla Everitt

author: Darla Everitt
title: Darla Everitt
text: I had a challenge processing my order on the web site, (I placed it twice!)and Taylor Casey, a Customer Care Advocate, was able to quickly resolve my situation. Taylor was incredibly responsive and assured me that the duplicate order would be promptly canceled and my account refunded. Taylor kept me informed every step of the way toward resolution. Thank you, Taylor!
